me.nimnon.nmengine.entity

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.Basic
      • me.nimnon.nmengine.entity.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sprite

    public class GameObject
extends Basic
    Game object class, skeleton for the sprite class that handles motion and dimension
    Author:
    Nimnon
